sense.name: a body of laws or statutes passed by a legislature
sense.examples: They are trying to overturn old legislation. He argued that legislation should determine marital rights and not judicial ruling. This case should be determined by existing antitrust legislation.

sense.name: the activity of making laws
sense.examples: The legislation of this tax bill will be accompanied by vociferous debate. The legislation of the Patriot Act occurred relatively quickly.

sense.name: a matter of business under review by a legislature
sense.commentary: LEGISLATION[+abstract][+body][-statute][+proposal][+submitted] Note: a body of propositions, as sense 1, but -not- yet passed into law.
sense.examples: This legislation may not pass the Senate. Congress has a lot of new legislation in front of it this session.
